name: Iubenda
headline: Easy to implement solutions to make your website compliant with the law in various countries and laws.
overview: Easily generate a fully customizable cookie banner, obtain consent and implement prior blocking with asynchronous reactivation.
features: Create your privacy and cookie policy in minutes
Manage consent preferences for the ePrivacy, GDPR, and CCPA. Integrated with the IAB TCF and US Privacy Framework
Create your terms and conditions in minutes
Collect GDPR consent, document opt-ins and CCPA opt-outs via your web forms
Document all the data processing activity within your organization
additionalInformation: To use the service, you must have an active Iubenda account. Some features are only available for specific plans.
